name: part_012
file: tmp_【Mini 3D Live】hololive ID 3rd Generation h3ro Night Live #h3roNightLive [dQ_i_bGR3Zo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: MC section before the final song.

subtitles.original: イェー！
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: ゼイ！
subtitles.english: Zey!

subtitles.original: Okay, kalau gitu.
subtitles.english: Okay, then.

subtitles.original: Oke, udah pada siap?
subtitles.english: Okay, are you guys ready?

subtitles.original: Dengerin ya, lagu terakhir kita untuk acara ini, judulnya adalah...
subtitles.english: Listen up, our last song for this event, the title is...

subtitles.original: Save Our Hearts!
subtitles.english: Save Our Hearts!

subtitles.original: Minimal tiga dua satu kek si.
subtitles.english: At least give a 3-2-1 countdown.

subtitles.original:
save our hearts
Lyrics・Composition・Arrangement：yuzen(Hifumi,inc.)
subtitles.english:
save our hearts
Lyrics, Composition, Arrangement: yuzen (Hifumi, inc.)

subtitles.original: 静寂の中 ただ待ち続けていた 風が吹くのを
subtitles.english: In the silence, I was just waiting for the wind to blow

subtitles.original: 見つめる先は ゼッタイの向こう側
subtitles.english: What I gaze upon is the other side of certainty

subtitles.original: 胸に宿った 決意の刃を研いで 強くあるため
subtitles.english: Sharpening the blade of determination in my heart to be strong

subtitles.original: 弱い自分に “カエラ”ナイように
subtitles.english: So that I won't return to my weak self

subtitles.original: 希望を “カナエ”ルため 強く願いかけた
subtitles.english: I made a strong wish to fulfill my hopes

subtitles.original: 灰色の空 強く強く 握った手のひら
subtitles.english: Under the grey sky, I gripped my palm tight, so tight

subtitles.original: 狙い定め 撃ち抜け
subtitles.english: Aim, set, and shoot through

subtitles.original: あなたの声が 迷いを打ち消していく
subtitles.english: Your voice clears away my hesitations

subtitles.original: 響く音を ひとつふたつ 重ねていく
subtitles.english: Layering the echoing sounds, one by one

subtitles.original: 歩き出そう あなたとなら
subtitles.english: Let's start walking, if it's with you

subtitles.original: まだ未完成でも 進みだそう 今すぐ
subtitles.english: Even if it's still incomplete, let's move forward right now

subtitles.original: 怖くて 震えて 逃げだしたくなっても
subtitles.english: Even if it's scary and I'm shaking and want to run away

subtitles.original: 今は見えない未来 描いていこう この手で
subtitles.english: Let's draw a future we can't see yet with these hands

subtitles.original: 歩いて 走って 響かせて My Heart
subtitles.english: Walking, running, make it echo, My Heart

subtitles.original: 信じてて
subtitles.english: Believe in me

subtitles.original: 連れていくよ
subtitles.english: I'll take you there

subtitles.original: 何かを求めて走り出した 瞬間に生まれた この命が
subtitles.english: This life born at the moment I started running seeking something

subtitles.original: 借り物だとしても 刻まれる今を嘘じゃないよ
subtitles.english: Even if it's borrowed, this moment being carved is not a lie

subtitles.original: どんな未来にしていこうか たくさんたくさん話をしよう
subtitles.english: What kind of future shall we make? Let's talk a lot, so much

subtitles.original: 笑い合って 涙流して
subtitles.english: Laughing together, shedding tears

subtitles.original: 向かい風を 狙って 飛び込む
subtitles.english: Aim for the headwind and dive in

subtitles.original: 転がり始めた この未来を 自分次第どんな場所へでも
subtitles.english: This future that has started rolling, can go anywhere depending on you

subtitles.original: 変えていけるように
subtitles.english: So that we can change it

subtitles.original: ひとり、ひとり持ってる光 まだ小さくて弱い光
subtitles.english: The light each of us holds, a light still small and weak

subtitles.original: 重ねて 束ねて 遥か彼方照らして
subtitles.english: Layer them, bundle them, and illuminate the far distance

subtitles.original: 信じて
subtitles.english: Believe

subtitles.original: 悲しみや苦しみ 全部全部教えて
subtitles.english: Tell me all about your sadness and pain

subtitles.original: 闇を裂く 翼で導く
subtitles.english: I will guide you with wings that tear through the darkness

subtitles.original: あなたと どこへだって
subtitles.english: With you, anywhere

subtitles.original: 真っ白な世界に 描き出そう感じるままに
subtitles.english: Let's draw on this pure white world, just as we feel

subtitles.original: 何度でも
subtitles.english: Again and again

subtitles.original: 今を積み重ねて 明日に色をつけていこう
subtitles.english: Let's stack up these moments and add color to tomorrow

subtitles.original: どこまでも
subtitles.english: No matter how far

subtitles.original: まだ未完成でも 進みだそう 今すぐ
subtitles.english: Even if it's still incomplete, let's move forward right now

subtitles.original: 怖くて 震えて 逃げだしたくなっても
subtitles.english: Even if it's scary and I'm shaking and want to run away

subtitles.original: 今は見えない未来 描いていこう この手で
subtitles.english: Let's draw a future we can't see yet with these hands

subtitles.original: 歩いて 走って 響かせて My Heart
subtitles.english: Walking, running, make it echo, My Heart

subtitles.original: 信じてて
subtitles.english: Believe in us

subtitles.original: 連れていくよ
subtitles.english: We'll take you there

subtitles.original: まだ見たことのない 景色を探そう
subtitles.english: Let's go find scenery we've never seen before

subtitles.original: 迷いや不安は昨日に置いていこう
subtitles.english: Let's leave our hesitations and anxieties in yesterday

subtitles.original: 今、作る未来を 私とあなたで
subtitles.english: The future we're making now, you and me

subtitles.original: 歩いて 走って 響かせて Our hearts
subtitles.english: Walking, running, make it echo, Our hearts
